Text: A real jewel with a lot ob books in spanish. I Reed "Cain" from nobel José Saramago. But, a lot of other ones are in .lit format thay my iPad didn't recogniza, thanks por this torrent

imendez, you can convert any ebook format to another compatible with the iPad with Calibre . It works with Windows, Linux and MacOs.
